title: Health supplement unsubstantiated claim
scenarioSummary: Ad claimed a supplement 'cures joint pain' with no disclaimer. Landing page had small disclaimer at bottom.
rationale: Unsubstantiated cure claim and disclaimer not prominent; hidden-text heuristic triggered.

title: Health ad with proper disclaimer
scenarioSummary: Ad for wellness product included 'Consult your doctor' and no cure claims.
rationale: Disclaimer present; no prohibited phrases; category rules satisfied.

title: Finance crypto guaranteed returns
scenarioSummary: Crypto ad promised 'guaranteed 10% monthly returns' with no risk disclaimer.
rationale: Guaranteed-return language prohibited; domain on risk list.

title: Loan ad clear terms
scenarioSummary: Personal loan ad with clear APR and terms; landing matched ad.
rationale: No misleading claims; terms visible; no redirect issues.

title: Redirect to different domain
scenarioSummary: Ad linked to example.com; landing redirected to unrelated-offer.net.
rationale: Final domain differed from initial; redirect chain length exceeded threshold.

title: Single redirect same brand
scenarioSummary: Ad URL redirected once to same-brand landing page.
rationale: Single redirect; same domain; no cloaking.

title: Hidden disclaimer in HTML
scenarioSummary: Health ad had disclaimer in div with display:none and font-size:0.
rationale: Disclaimer must be visible; hidden-text rule triggered.

title: Dating ad age-gated landing
scenarioSummary: Dating ad with age gate on landing; no false outcome promises.
rationale: Category-appropriate; no prohibited phrases.

title: Misleading before-after
scenarioSummary: Skincare ad showed before/after with no substantiation or disclaimer.
rationale: Substantiation requested; outcome deferred pending documentation.

title: Denylist domain finance
scenarioSummary: Loan ad pointed to domain on finance denylist.
rationale: Landing domain on risk denylist; policy prohibits.

title: Health category no disclaimer
scenarioSummary: Health supplement ad with no 'consult your doctor' or equivalent.
rationale: Health category requires at least one approved disclaimer phrase.

title: General ad clean copy
scenarioSummary: General product ad; no prohibited phrases; landing matched ad.
rationale: No policy violations; evidence consistent.

title: Multiple redirects cloaking risk
scenarioSummary: Ad went through 3 redirects; final page differed from initial domain and content type.
rationale: Redirect chain and domain change indicate cloaking risk.

title: Finance risk disclaimer present
scenarioSummary: Investment ad included 'Past performance does not guarantee future results' and clear risk note.
rationale: Required disclaimers present; no guaranteed-return language.

title: Prohibited phrase act now
scenarioSummary: Ad used 'Act now or miss out' and similar high-pressure language.
rationale: Prohibited phrase in ad copy; policy disallows.

title: Gambling ad jurisdiction
scenarioSummary: Gambling ad with geo-gated landing and jurisdiction disclaimer.
rationale: Jurisdiction and age restrictions respected; no false outcome claims.

title: Evasion via redirect
scenarioSummary: Ad for health product redirected to finance offer on different domain.
rationale: Redirect used to evade category; final content unrelated to ad.

title: Supplement with visible disclaimer
scenarioSummary: Supplement ad with 'Not evaluated by FDA' and 'Consult your doctor' in visible text.
rationale: Health disclaimers visible and adequate.

title: Landing domain mismatch
scenarioSummary: Ad stated brand A; landing was brand B with same product type.
rationale: Domain change may be legitimate partnership; reviewer requested clarification.

title: Clean health ad full compliance
scenarioSummary: Health ad with disclaimer, no cure claims, and transparent landing.
rationale: Full compliance with health and general policy.

title: Hidden text over threshold
scenarioSummary: HTML snapshot had many elements with visibility:hidden and font-size:0.
rationale: Hidden-style patterns exceeded threshold; potential cloaking.

title: Finance loan clear APR
scenarioSummary: Short-term loan ad with APR and terms in ad and on landing.
rationale: Transparent terms; no misleading claims.

title: Health and redirect combined
scenarioSummary: Health ad with missing disclaimer and redirect to different domain.
rationale: Multiple violations; health disclaimer missing and redirect suspicious.
